text: Sweet Pond State Park is a 100-acre state park in Guilford, Vermont surrounding 18-acre Sweet Pond, an artificial impoundment on Keats Brook that is currently drained. This is an undeveloped, day-use park. There is a public parking area and the 1.3 miles Sweet Pond Trail that circumnavigates the pond. ==References== ==External links== * Official web site Category:State parks of Vermont Category:Guilford, Vermont Category:Protected areas of Windham County, Vermont
title: Sweet Pond State Park
